特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（心理Ａ）（CIEC）/Japanese Psychology A（国際学部）
授業方法:
(a) Lectures about the basics of cultural psychology 
(b) Discussions based on pre-class assignments
(c) Group research project and presentations

トピック.授業計画1:
Module 1: Introduction to cultural psychology (Week 1-2)

Module 2: Non-verbal communication and culture (Week 3-4)

Module 3: Emotions and culture (Week 5-6)

Module 4: Social relationships and culture (Week 7-8)

Module 5: Values and culture (Week 9-10)

Module 6: Project presentations and final report (Week 11-14)
トピック.授業外学習2:
Students are recommended to complete the pre-class assignments and review the class-related materials (e.g., PDF handouts).
They are required to attend class regularly and submit a short reflection paper (e.g., questions and/or comments about lectures and/or in-class discussions) at the end of each
class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【300】総合日本学習科目（心理Ａ）／JSC Japanese Psychology A
担当者: リュウ　ソラヤ（LIU SORAYA）
